remarks: Membership in the projective subspace closure function.  (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:

pclfval.s $e |- S = ( PSubSp ` K ) $.
pclfval.c $e |- U = ( PCl ` K ) $.
elpcl.q $e |- Q e. _V $.
elpclN $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ X C_ A ) -> ( Q e. ( U ` X ) <-> A. y e. S ( X C_ y -> Q e. y ) ) ) $.
